attributes.action: Review the laws concerning knife crime
attributes.additional_details:
I feel there is an imbalance in our law system the punishment and the powers the police have is far to weak .
I feel that if the punishment is so severe then these young people in gangs might just think again about carrying weapons or giving in to peer pressure to commit a crime.
We have armed forced veterans living on streets homeless why not set up camps give these service men/women jobs and put these offenders in them where they can learn discipline and be educated.
attributes.background:
Make the laws so severe if you injure or kill somebody using a knife. 
Using a knife should mean life people are scared to walk the streets or enjoy themselves

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase sentences relating to knife crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563199

Zero Tolerance on Knife Crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581806

Minimum 10-year sentence for knife possession and 20 years for use of a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580709
